about_the_game:
Based on the blockbuster movie by Marvel Studios, Iron Man™ blasts onto the the PC! Immerse yourself in hardcore shooting action and explosive combat from the film as well as exclusive content created just for the game. Customize your Iron Man suit and battle against armies of fighter jets, tanks, armored Super Villains and more. You are a One Man Army. You are Iron Man.

  • One Man Army: Fight in the air or drop down to the ground as you engage tanks, fighter jets, cannons, massive weapon arrays and enemy superheroes.
  • Customization: Upgrade the Iron Man suit with improved armor, thrusters and weapons, then choose what equipment to use for the next mission.
  • Non-linear Gameplay: You have complete freedom to explore your environment and choose your own path to victory.
  • Contextual Attacks: Use your fists to put vehicles out of commission, take command of gun turrets or catch missiles out of the air and redirect them at your enemies.
  • Hero Choices: Additional objectives can be completed to limit human casualties.
  • Celebrity Voices: Robert Downey Jr., Terrence Howard and Shaun Toub are featured in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Supported OS: Microsoft Windows 2000/XP/Vista
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1 GB of system RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB DirectX 9.0c video card
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 6 GB of hard disc space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Supported OS: Microsoft Windows 2000/XP/Vista
  • Processor: 3.4 GHz processor
  • Memory: 1.5 GB of system RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon X1800/GeForce 7800 GT video card
  • DirectX Version: DirectX 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 6 GB of hard disc space
  • Peripherals: Windows-compatible Game Controller
